YARN-4439. Clarify NMContainerStatus#toString method. Contributed by (xgong: rev d8a45425eba372cdebef3be50436b6ddf1c4e192)
* hadoop-yarn-project/CHANGES.txt

This broke the branch-2.7 build, see YARN-4458 for details.
Hi [~jianhe], Could you revert the old patch and create a new patch for branch-2.7 to fix the compilation error?
Thanks. Attached an addendum patch to fix the compilation issue in branch-2.7.

+1, this is the same patch from YARN-4458.  I'm going to commit this as a revert of the original followed by a commit with the original and the addendum combined.  That way it's easier to pick to other releases (e.g. 2.6.x)

Reverted and re-committed to branch-2.7.  Thanks [~xgong] and [~zxu]!

As a side note, I noticed MAPREDUCE-6436 was placed in the wrong CHANGES.txt file (yarn vs. mapreduce).  [~zxu] could you clean that up?  Don't need a whole new JIRA, can do it under the original.
Good Catch [~jlowe]! Will clean it up! thanks.
Closing the JIRA as part of 2.7.3 release.
